title: League keeps crashing my PC
body: League keeps crashing in loading screen and i can't quit the window so I have to hard reset my pc. Keeps happening 3/4 games since the patch. How do I fix this?

replies.body:
Anything that is hard locking or crashing a PC is a result of the PC being damaged in some way, not the software. User-space software simply cant do that by itself, but it can trigger an instability via intensive load or unusual functions.

First things to do are check for any recent driver updates, check your CPU and GPU temperatures during a game to verify nothing is overheating, verify drive health, verify operating system integrity. and run stress tests on your CPU, GPU, and RAM to ensure each is stable.

If it is, it is just showing off how shit a lot of PCs are. probably people who are not used to running any remotely demanding software and are unaware of system issues.
